long_description: The Ruffwear Hydro Plane dog toy is perfect for dogs who love to play fetch in and around the water. Disc floats high on top of the water like a pontoon for increased visibility when swimming. Soft foam construction with durable nylon outer fabric goes easy on your dog's mouth, returns to its original shape and stands up to abrasion.
short_description: The Ruffwear Hydro Plane dog toy is perfect for dogs who love to play fetch in and around the water.
